title: Hit and Run
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: He turned left and headed south. He followed the plumes of black smoke, down Minto Street and past Cameron Toll, until he was at The Inch. Didn't take long, but his phone rang four times.

title: Lucy, Francis and Cousin Bill. A novel, etc
author: Wistan, Aden.
snippet: Lucy smiled, as if to say she understood, andthey drove off. There was little speaking until they were nearthe end of Minto Street, when a subdued laughfrom Lucy broke the silence. Her sister onlylooked at her.

title: Solved Mysteries; or, Revelations of a City Detective
author: Macgovan, James.
snippet: Thegirl still counselled waiting till morning before raising any alarm,but Miss Greenhill, with many reproaches, insisted on havingthe police, and went with her servant for the purpose, beingafraid to remain in the house alone. In Minto Street theycame upon a policeman, and took him back with them tothe cottage.
